fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Competition, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Regional Policy, External Relations, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
SMEs financing projects in support of innovation. 
I will be responsible for the communicatios with EU and for writing the request for support. 
The company (SME) I am assisting asks me to represent them in Brussels.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: I am not member of any association or similars.
goals__remit: I had a long experience as a consultant for technological innovation and, after retirement, I seldom assist SMEs or Medium Size Companies on that subject. Normally I simply ask them to refund my travels expenses as I hate doing nothing and I love brainstorms on new industrial products in my field of competence.
relevant_communication: My relationship with the SME I am assisting are quite recents and I did not yet took any precise action except the request of meeting a specific commissioner deeply involved in the nature of the innovation possessed by the SME I am representing.
